free_text.Learning outcomes: The purpose of the course is to introduce the participants to the main legal rules and principles of Swiss, European and International energy law, and to examine the main contractual mechanisms applied in the energy sector.
free_text.Content: I. International, European and Swiss Energy Policy - Energy Law Legal Sources[br/]II. Legal and Contractual Regime of Exploration and Exploitation of Mineral Resources (Oil and Gas)[br/]III.Legal and Contractual Regime of Transportation of Mineral Resources (Oil and Gas)[br/]IV. Liberalisation of Electricity Market in Switzerland against the EU background[br/]V. Introduction to Nuclear Law[br/]VI. Introduction to Hydroelectricity law[br/]VII. Renewables Energies and the law[br/]VIII. Climate Change and the Law (joint implementation, clean development mechanisms, CO2 emission trading)[br/]
